description: Credential harvesting, fake login pages, account verification scams

emails.email_subject: URGENT: Your account has been limited
emails.email_snippet: We noticed unusual activity on your account. Please verify your identity within 24 hours or your account will be permanently suspended.

emails.email_subject: Your order #738-2847382 has been placed
emails.email_snippet: If you did not make this purchase of $899.99, click here immediately to cancel and secure your account.

emails.email_subject: Your Apple ID has been locked
emails.email_snippet: Your Apple ID has been locked for security reasons. Verify your information to restore access to your account.

emails.email_subject: Payment declined - Update required
emails.email_snippet: We were unable to process your payment. Update your billing information to continue enjoying Netflix.

emails.email_subject: Your Office 365 subscription expires today
emails.email_snippet: Your subscription will be cancelled unless you confirm your payment details immediately.

emails.email_subject: Suspicious login detected on your account
emails.email_snippet: We detected a login from an unrecognized device. If this wasn't you, secure your account now.

emails.email_subject: Important: Verify your account information
emails.email_snippet: Due to recent security updates, we require all customers to verify their account information within 48 hours.

emails.email_subject: Your account access has been restricted
emails.email_snippet: Unusual activity detected. Complete verification to restore full access to your account.

emails.email_subject: Someone shared a file with you
emails.email_snippet: John Smith shared 'Financial_Report_2024.pdf' with you. Sign in to view the document.

emails.email_subject: Storage limit exceeded - Action required
emails.email_snippet: Your Google Drive storage is full. Verify your account to get 50GB free bonus storage.

emails.email_subject: Payment failed - Account will be downgraded
emails.email_snippet: We couldn't charge your card. Update payment method to keep Premium features.

emails.email_subject: Confirm your identity to keep your account
emails.email_snippet: We detected suspicious activity. Verify your identity or your account will be disabled in 24 hours.

emails.email_subject: Your account will be permanently deleted
emails.email_snippet: Someone reported your account for violating terms. Appeal within 24 hours to prevent deletion.

emails.email_subject: Verify your account to keep the blue checkmark
emails.email_snippet: Under our new policy, verified accounts must re-verify. Complete verification to keep your badge.

emails.email_subject: Your LinkedIn account was accessed from a new device
emails.email_snippet: We noticed a new sign-in from Russia. If this wasn't you, secure your account immediately.

emails.email_subject: Unauthorized withdrawal attempt detected
emails.email_snippet: Someone tried to withdraw 2.5 BTC from your account. Verify your identity to block this transaction.

emails.email_subject: Complete KYC verification to avoid account suspension
emails.email_snippet: New regulatory requirements require identity verification. Complete KYC within 24 hours.

emails.email_subject: Payment of $750.00 received - Confirm to deposit
emails.email_snippet: You received a payment. Log in to confirm and transfer to your bank account.

emails.email_subject: Your Zelle transfer of $1,200 is pending
emails.email_snippet: Verify your bank details to complete the transfer from Michael Johnson.

emails.email_subject: Unusual activity - Verify your Cash App
emails.email_snippet: We detected unusual activity and temporarily limited your account. Verify to restore access.

emails.email_subject: Action Required: Update your direct deposit information
emails.email_snippet: Due to a system upgrade, all employees must re-verify their banking information by Friday.

emails.email_subject: Password expires in 24 hours
emails.email_snippet: Your corporate password will expire tomorrow. Click here to update it and avoid losing access.

emails.email_subject: Document shared: Q4 Budget Report.xlsx
emails.email_snippet: Your manager shared a document with you. Sign in with your corporate credentials to view.

emails.email_subject: Complete your signature: Employment Agreement
emails.email_snippet: A document requires your signature. Review and sign to complete your onboarding.

emails.email_subject: You missed a scheduled meeting - Recording available
emails.email_snippet: John Smith's meeting recording is available. Sign in to view the recording.

emails.email_subject: Package delivery failed - Address verification needed
emails.email_snippet: Your package could not be delivered. Verify your address and pay the $1.99 redelivery fee.

emails.email_subject: Shipment on hold - Custom fees due
emails.email_snippet: Your international package requires customs clearance. Pay $45.00 to release your shipment.

emails.email_subject: Final notice: Package will be returned
emails.email_snippet: We attempted delivery 3 times. Schedule redelivery now or package will be returned to sender.

emails.email_subject: Your shipment is delayed - Update delivery preferences
emails.email_snippet: Due to incomplete address information, we need you to confirm delivery details.

emails.email_subject: Your Creative Cloud subscription payment failed
emails.email_snippet: We couldn't process your payment. Update your billing information to continue using Adobe apps.

emails.email_subject: Your iCloud storage is almost full
emails.email_snippet: Upgrade your storage plan now. As a special offer, get 200GB free by verifying your account.

emails.email_subject: Your Steam account has been compromised
emails.email_snippet: We detected unauthorized access. Reset your password immediately to secure your games library.

emails.email_subject: Buyer filed a dispute - Respond within 24 hours
emails.email_snippet: A buyer claims item not received. Log in to provide tracking information and avoid refund.

emails.email_subject: Order confirmation #WMT-8374628
emails.email_snippet: Your order for iPhone 15 Pro ($1,299.00) is confirmed. If you didn't place this order, cancel here.

emails.email_subject: Redeem your 5,000 Target Circle points
emails.email_snippet: Your points expire in 48 hours. Sign in to redeem your $50 reward before it's gone.

emails.email_subject: You've won a $500 Best Buy Gift Card!
emails.email_snippet: Congratulations! Claim your prize by verifying your information within 24 hours.

emails.email_subject: Your Costco membership has expired
emails.email_snippet: Renew your Executive membership today and get a $25 bonus gift card.

emails.email_subject: Your Hulu subscription has been cancelled
emails.email_snippet: Due to payment issues, your subscription was cancelled. Reactivate now to avoid losing your watchlist.

emails.email_subject: Suspicious activity on your Disney+ account
emails.email_snippet: Someone accessed your account from an unknown device. Secure your account immediately.

emails.email_subject: Complete your HBO Max profile setup
emails.email_snippet: Your free trial is active. Complete your profile to unlock all features and continue watching.

emails.email_subject: Your AT&T bill is past due - Service interruption warning
emails.email_snippet: Pay your outstanding balance of $178.45 immediately to avoid service disconnection.

emails.email_subject: Verizon: Your payment method needs updating
emails.email_snippet: The card on file has expired. Update your payment method to continue your service.

emails.email_subject: You're eligible for a free iPhone upgrade!
emails.email_snippet: As a valued T-Mobile customer, claim your free iPhone 15. Limited time offer - verify now.

emails.email_subject: Important: Verify your Xfinity account
emails.email_snippet: We need to verify your identity due to recent security updates. Complete verification within 48 hours.

emails.email_subject: Spectrum: Your service will be disconnected
emails.email_snippet: Your account is past due. Pay now to avoid service interruption and reconnection fees.

emails.email_subject: Receipt for your trip - $847.23
emails.email_snippet: Thanks for riding with Uber. If you didn't take this trip, report it immediately.

emails.email_subject: Your Lyft account has been suspended
emails.email_snippet: Due to suspicious activity, your account was suspended. Verify your identity to reactivate.

emails.email_subject: Your DoorDash order is on the way!
emails.email_snippet: Your $156.00 order from Red Lobster is being prepared. Didn't order? Cancel here immediately.

emails.email_subject: Grubhub: Confirm your new delivery address
emails.email_snippet: Your delivery address was changed. If you didn't make this change, secure your account.

emails.email_subject: Instacart: Payment method declined
emails.email_snippet: Your order couldn't be processed. Update your payment method to complete your grocery delivery.

emails.email_subject: IRS: Your tax refund of $4,832.00 is pending
emails.email_snippet: Your tax refund is ready. Verify your direct deposit information to receive your refund within 3 days.

emails.email_subject: Social Security: Action required for your benefits
emails.email_snippet: Your Social Security benefits may be suspended. Verify your information to continue receiving payments.

emails.email_subject: DMV: Your driver's license renewal is due
emails.email_snippet: Renew your license online and save time. Complete the process by verifying your identity.

emails.email_subject: Medicare: Update your plan information
emails.email_snippet: Important changes to your Medicare coverage require immediate action. Update your information now.

emails.email_subject: Claim your $1,400 stimulus payment
emails.email_snippet: You're eligible for an additional stimulus payment. Verify your identity and bank details to receive funds.
